DataElement.preferredDefinition: an indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or not applicable related to assessment of pre-treatment removal and pathologic examination of specimens in the form of small pieces of tissue from the living body.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to assessment of pre-treatment removal and pathologic examination of specimens in the form of small pieces of tissue from the living body.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.:Removal and pathologic examination of specimens in the form of small pieces of tissue from the living body.

Concepts.definition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.
The removal of tissue specimens or fluid from the living body for microscopic examination, performed to establish a diagnosis.

Property.preferredDefinition: The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: GOG CRF:Gynecologic Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/not applicable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or not applicable.

Concepts.longName: Yes, No, or Not Applicable Response
Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or not applicable.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 04-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 8/3/2015 Corrections made to VD in order to restore to original format: removed C49486 as rep term and replaced with C49797; restored long name and definition per Dianne Reeves/tt.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Will the patient have any tis
ReferenceDocuments.description: Will the patient have any tissue biopsy, such as a core biopsy, within 7 days prior to treatment start date of Bevacizumab therapy (cycle 2)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Will the patient have any minor surgical procedures, fine needle aspirates or core biopsies within 7 days prior to the first date of Bevacizumab therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient had any minor surgical procedures, fine needle aspirates or core biopsies within 7 days prior to the first date of dalantercept therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient had, or anticipate to have, any of the following invasive procedures: major surical procedure, open biopsy or significant traumatic injury within 28 days prior to the first date of bevacizumab therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: GOG_CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient had the placement of a vascular access device or core biopsy within 7 days prior to the first date of treatment on this study?

DataElement.origin: GOG CRF:Gynecologic Oncology Group Case Report Form
DataElement.changeDescription: Replaced VD Assessments Ind-3b 2958018v1 with VD ID#3506036 - Yes No Not Applicable Indicator - dbw
